content.text: Match ends, Mirandés 2, Almería 1.
Second Half ends, Mirandés 2, Almería 1.
Attempt saved. Antonio Puertas (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Joaquín Fernández with a headed pass.
Foul by Pedro Martín (Mirandés).
Jorge Morcillo (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Juanjo (Almería) left footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the left.
